org.spongepowered.api.text.message

Class Messages

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.text.message.Messages

  • public final class Messages
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to work with and create Messages.

      • builder

        public static MessageBuilder<java.lang.Object> builder(java.lang.Object score,
                                                       java.lang.String override)
        Creates a new MessageBuilder that builds Message.Score messages. If you wish to not override the score, use the builder(Object) method.
        Parameters:
        score - The score of the Message
        override - The override of the score
        Returns:
        A

      • of

        public static <T> Message<T> of(T content)
        Creates a new MessageBuilder out of the given content and builds it immediately. This is a shorthand to builder(Object).
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type parameter of the Message
        Parameters:
        content - The content of the Message
        Returns:
        The constructed Message
